form.name: Yuria
form.background: Yuria used to reside in a small village in the Neth Empire. However, because of the war with Trista, Yuria lost her parents and barely managed to survive, thanks to the general of the Neth Army. Since then Yuria feels indebted to the Neth Army and is working as a hospital orderly.

skill.passive: Of the allies affected by Yuria's block skill, the hero with the lowest HP will be vitalized, immediately activating the vitalized ally's block skill under the same count as Yuria's passive trigger chain, and recovering HP equal to (100/150/200)% of Yuria's attack power. Passive is not activated when Yuria heals herself. (Once every 4 seconds)

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Resistance Yuria
form.background: Yuria became a military nursing officer due to her outstanding abilities. She always had the same vocation with the man who saved her life. However, one day she recognizes that he is going down the wrong path and eventually decides to stand alone to keep her beliefs.

skill.passive: Of the allies affected by Yuria's block skill, the hero with the lowest HP will be vitalized, immediately activating the vitalized ally's block skill under the same count as Yuria's passive trigger chain, and recovering HP equal to (100/150/200)% of Yuria's attack power. Passive is not activated when Yuria heals herself. (Once every 4 seconds)

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Neth Army Officer Yuria
form.background: As the head of the Resistance army, Yuria took part in revealing the Neth Empire's dirty secret. She lost what she thought was the most important thing in her life, but has overcome it and worked hard as a temporary representative of the new Neth Empire.

skill.passive: Of the allies affected by Yuria's block skill, the hero with the lowest HP will be vitalized, immediately activating the vitalized ally's block skill under the same count as Yuria's passive trigger chain, and recovering HP equal to (100/150/200)% of Yuria's attack power. Passive is not activated when Yuria heals herself. (Once every 3 seconds)

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

faust.skillDescription: Using blocks make the hero throw a potion to the allies in the front. The potion will break and release smoke that heals allies in a range equal to (100/180/210)% of allies' attack power for 2 seconds

form.name: Faust
form.background: An alchemist wandering to fill the emptiness within. His wanderlust earned him great knowledge of both eastern and western medicine. It was on one of his neverending journeys that he met the warrior Sien, and his love for her finally quietens his restlessness, settling down in a quiet country village as a felllow mercenaries.

skill.passive: After an ally attacks 10 times, throw a potion to the allies in the front. The potion will break and release smoke that heals allies within range equal to (100%) of the allies' attack power for 2 seconds.

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Faust of Taboos
form.background: Yet Faust's happiness does not last long: after fatally losing Sien during a monster expedition, Faust combines the western study of alchemy and a forbidden spell of the ancient east to revive Sien as an undead jiangsi. Sien, after all, is the first and only meaning to his life.

skill.passive: After an ally attacks 10 times, throw a potion to the allies in the front. the potion will break and release smoke that heals allies within range equal to (100%) of the allies' attack power for 2 seconds.

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Faust of Desolation
form.background: But when the revived Sien does not listen to Faust's pleas and instead disappears into the shadows, Faust once more begins a neverending journey to find her: a journey that may have no meaning, for Sien is not his Sien anymore. Yet he cannot stop. He cannot rest. She is the only meaning to his life. She is everything and the only thing that remains for him.

skill.passive: After an ally attacks 10 times, throw a potion to the allies in the front. The potion will break and release smoke that heals allies within range equal to (100%) of the allies' attack power for 2 seconds and increases armor/magic penetration by 100%.

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

seiren.skillDescription: When a block is used, Bubble Shower deals magical damage equal to (60/150/270)% of hero's attack power.

form.name: Seiren
form.background: In the southeast lands of Hasla near the Primal Mountain dwell various minor tribes and peoples. Among them is the Naga Tribe, the elusive inhabitants of the deeper waters of the surrounding ocean. Seiren is once Naga who is more curious about the life on land than her fellow tribespeople.

skill.passive: When a block skill hits an enemy, the enemy's movement speed decreases by 50%. Seiren casts Shell that creates a shield around an ally that absorbs damage equal to (10/30/50)% of Seiren's HP for 5 seconds based on the length of the chain skill that Seiren uses. While Shell shield is active the ally will be healed for 5% of their HP every second.

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Tempestuous Seiren
form.background: Unable to quench her curiosity, Seiren runs away from home to a life above water. Yet before long  she finds herself utterly lost and helpless, and loses consciousness in the midst of crying for help. Fortunately, a pirate hunter who hears Seiren's beautiful voice rescues her, and takes her to Valencia.

skill.passive: When a block skill hits an enemy, the enemy's movement speed decreases by 50%. Seiren casts Shell that creates a shield around an ally that absorbs damage equal to (10/30/50)% of Seiren's HP for 5 seconds based on the length of the chain skill that Seiren uses. While Shell shield is active the ally will be healed for 5% of their HP every second.

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Ambassador Seiren
form.background: Seiren wakes up in Valencia and is immediately charmed by life on land. Her happiness does not last long, however, the other Nagas discover her whereabouts and insist on taking her back to their home in the deep sea. After returning home, Seiren volunteers to become an ambassador between the residents under water and those above water.

skill.passive: When a block skill hits an enemy, the enemy's movement speed decreases by 50%. Seiren casts Shell that creates a shield around an ally that absorbs damge equal to (20/50/80)% of Seiren's HP for 5 seconds based on the length of the chain skill that Seiren uses. While Shell shield is active the ally will be healed for 5% of their HP every second.

noel.skillDescription: Heals ally with the lowest HP equal to (30/42/58)% of hero's maximum HP based on chain number.

form.name: Noel
form.background: Noel lives in Elandia, the Holy City. Her devoted parents brought her to Elandia when she was young. Noel felt supressed due to the godly mood of the city. She only felt normal while wearing her helmet and acting like a knight.

skill.passive: When ally other than Noel is attacked, Noel goes to the front and swings her sword, push and stun enemy for 1.5 seconds and get 30% of ally's damage for 5 seconds. (once per 5 seconds, Noel does not debuffs instead, and damaged ally's armor and resistance will be applicated to Noel.)

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Divine Knight Noel
form.background: Noel watched the Knights of the Order of the Goddess while they were training, and would often imitate them for fun. The head of the Knights once saw Noel following their moves and asked her parents if they could scout her. Noel then became the youngest knight.

skill.passive: When ally other than Noel is attacked, Noel goes to the front and swings her sword, push and stun enemy for 1.5 seconds and get 30% of ally's damage for 5 seconds. (once per 5 seconds, Noel does not debuffs instead, and damaged ally's armor and resistance will be applicated to Noel.)

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Divine Guardian Noel
form.background: Noel was no longer a hidden treasure. With talent and devotion inherited from her parents, she soon became a official knight. She became a star in the Order due to her politeness and sweetness.

skill.passive: When ally other than Noel is attacked, Noel goes to the front and swings her sword, push and stun enemy for 1.5 seconds and get 50% of ally's damage for 5 seconds. (once per 5 seconds, Noel does not debuffs instead, and damaged ally's armor and resistance will be applicated to Noel.) When Noel's HP goes under 50%, the next block will count as  3-chain skill for once, healing entire ally and Noel's armor and resistance increase by 1000 each for 5 seconds.

howToGet: Contract: Buy Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

bravedog.skillDescription: Summons a demon sword that deals magic damage equal to (56/178/322)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Brave Dog
form.background: There are two things you can count on in this world: Brave Dog being brave and Goblins smelling like old milk.
howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

warrior.skillDescription: A piercing attack that deals physical damage equal to (49/150/271)% of attack power.

form.name: Warrior
form.background: As a warrior of the East, he trains to reach a higher state of being by battling against the strongest opponents he can find.
howToGet: Stage: Appears at Deep Sea 3-13 Hard.
Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

farmboy.skillDescription: Throws a wave of energy that deals magic damage equal to (49/122/221)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Farm Boy
form.background: He worked hard on the farm, but now he's set out on a quest to save his cabbages from monsters.

solbadguy.skillDescription: Using a chain skill activates Fafnir, Gun Flame or Grand Viper, dealing physical damage equal to (150/200/320)% of hero's attack power.

form.name: Sol Badguy
form.background: A researcher who studied high-end technology in another dimension. His coleague 'That Man' betrayed him. Sol lost his lover and was converted into a human/machine weapon as a result of the betrayal. He vowed to use his newfound power to get revenge upon 'That Man'. He wanders the land in search of gears so that he may complete his revenge.

skill.passive: Using a block after an ally's chain-3 skill, activates Gun flame and Grand viper consecutively.

form.name: Sol Badguy
form.background: Sol brought down Ramlethal, after she declared war against mankind. However, Sol was just bait to revive Justice the Destroyer. With the help of Ramlethal and her twin sister Elphelt he won over Justice, but Elphelt was caught by 'Ruthless Revelation'.

skill.passive: Using a block after an ally's chain-3 skill, activates Gun flame and Grand viper consecutively.

form.name: Sol Badguy
form.background: As Sol was preparing to go after 'Ruthless Revelation', 'That Man' came to him and asked him to help defeat 'Ruthless Revelation'. Sol was confilcted by this turn of events. and while contemplating these thoughts, a mysterious magic led Sol to Hasla.

skill.passive: Using a block after an ally's chain-3 skill, activates Gun flame and Grand viper consecutively.

kykiske.skillDescription: Launches (Stun Edge/Stun Edge(Charge Attack)/Sacred Edge) that deals magical damage equal to (80/155/255)% of the Hero's attack power according to the chain length. Damaged enemy can't move for 1 second.

form.name: Ky Kiske
form.background: Genius prosecutor from the Holy Knights. His looks, charisma and talent as a fencer make him popular among the citizens. He thinks of Sol as a rival, and he has to compete against Sol's outgoing personality.

skill.passive: Ride the lightning: Pushes enemy back and deals magical damage equal to 285% of hero's attack power when an enemy is hit by Sacred Edge. Using a block after an ally's chain-3 skill launches Sacred Edge 1 time.

form.name: Ky Kiske
form.background: Ky was recognized for his contribution during the Holy War and became the King of Iryulia. However, Iryulia faces collapse after the attack from 'Ruthless Revelation'. Ky managed to save Iruylia and his wife Dizzy with the help of his colleagues.

skill.passive: Ride the lightning: Pushes enemy back and deals magical damage equal to 285% of hero's attack power when an enemy is hit by Sacred Edge. Using a block after an ally's chain-3 skill launches Sacred Edge 1 time.

form.name: Ky Kiske
form.background: Ruthless Revelation has continously threatened mankind, leading Ky to investigate how he could stop them. At the moment when he finally found clues about 'Ruthless Revelation', a mysterous magic square led him to Hasla.

skill.passive: Ride the lightning: Pushes enemy back and deals magical damage equal to 350% of hero's attack power and reduces damage taken by 25% when an enemy is hit by Sacred Edge. Using a block after an ally's chain-3 skill, launches Sacred Edge 2 times.

milliarage.skillDescription: When a block is used it activates Lust Shaker that deals magic damage equal to (60/150/270)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Millia Rage
form.background: Assassin from another dimension. Millia became an orphan during the Holy War. 'Jato', the Assassin leader has raised her since then. She is now a decent Assassin member, mainly because of Jato and has used prohibited spells gaining the ability to handle her hairs quite freely.

skill.passive: When block is used after 2 auto attacks it activates Winger. Winger deals magic damage equal to (120/300/500)% of hero's attack power depending on chain length. (Once per 3 seconds)

form.name: Millia Rage
form.background: Millia is distressed because of what Assassins do. She betrays the Assassin group which leads to her being hunted. Meanwhile Jato the leader as lost his ego, and his shaddow "Eddie" who ruled after him. Unfortunately, he has perished too. As a result this Millia is free, but suffers from hatred and guilt.

skill.passive: When block is used after 2 auto attacks it activates Winger. Winger deals magic damage equal to (120/300/500)% of hero's attack power depending on chain length. (Once per 3 seconds)

form.name: Millia Rage
form.background: Millia hears a rumor that Jati might still be alive, and starts looking for him. She is attacked by Bed Man the mysterious guy. However Jato appears and saves Millia. Millia and the Assassins start searching for the mysterious guy, when all of a sudden Millia is ditched at Hasla due to an unexpected change in dimension.

skill.passive: When block is used after 2 auto attacks it activates Winger. Winger deals magic damage equal to (120/300/500)% of hero's attack power depending on chain length. Additionally, allies critical strike chance is increased by 20% for 4 seconds. (Once per 3 seconds)

johnny.skillDescription: When a block is used, Mist Finer is activated dealing physical damage equal to (60/130/250)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Johnny
form.background: The leader of the Jellyfish air pirates from another dimension. He became an orphan during the Holy War and stood alone since then. He finds out that there are many other people in the same circumstance. To save them he organized the Jellyfish air pirates.

skill.passive: When an ally or the hero uses a chain-3 skill, a coin is thrown at the enemy. When the coin hits an enemy, the next block skill used will do 30% more damage.

form.name: Johnny
form.background: Johnny journeys off to find a doctor who cures diseases to save May, who is suffering from mysterious headaches. In one village he finds the doctor, and succeeds in asking him to cure May.

skill.passive: When an ally or the hero uses a chain-3 skill, a coin is thrown at the enemy. When the coin hits an enemy, the next block skill used will do 30% more damage.

form.name: Johnny
form.background: Johnny contacts 'Liberator' who is essential for curing May and any Japanese who suffer from the same pain. While heading to Colony where Japanese live to meet Liberator, Johnny is ditched at Hasla due to an unexpected change in dimension.

skill.passive: When an ally or the hero uses a chain-3 skill, a coin is thrown at the enemy. When the coin hits an enemy, the next 2 block skills used will do 50% more damage. After the skill ends, "That's My Name" will activate dealing physical damage equal to 500% of the hero's attack power.

kyokusanagi.skillDescription: Releases a ball of energy that deals physical damage equal to [80/190/360]% of attack power.

form.name: Kyo Kusanagi
form.background: A pyrokinetic student of the Kusanagi clan. Although lazy and rebellious, he is a born fighter of natural skill. Recently he became the champion of the national martial arts competition in Japan.

skill.passive: Upon using 3 blocks, next block is changed to "Ura 108 Shiki: Orochi Nagi," and deals additional physical damage equal to 450% of attack power. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor penetration is increased by 250 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Kyo Kusanagi
form.background: Kyo receives an invitation to a mysterious fighting tournament called "The King of Fighters," and once again forms a team with Benimaru Nikaido and Goro Daimon, whom he met during the national martial arts competition. Yet Kyo soon discovers that "The King of Fighters" is no ordinary tournament: it is part of a greater scheme to revive Orochi, the eight-headed snake entity.

skill.passive: Upon using 3 blocks, next block is changed to "Ura 108 Shiki: Orochi Nagi," and deals additional physical damage equal to 450% of attack power. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor penetration is increased by 250 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Kyo Kusanagi
form.background: Long ago the three clans of Kusanagi, Yasakani, and Yata succeeded in sealing Orochi. Facing the revived Orochi as his ancestors once did, Kyo gains full control over the Sacred Treasure of Kusanagi. With his final blow against Orochi, Kyo and Orochi's powers collide in a brilliant explosion that transports Kyo to the dimension of Hasla.

skill.passive: Upon using 3 blocks, next block is changed to "Ura 108 Shiki: Orochi Nagi," and deals additional physical damage equal to 450% of attack power. If last explosion damage does not kill enemy, attack is reactivated. (Once every 5 seconds) Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor penetration is increased by 250 for 8 seconds.

ioriyagami.skillDescription: Releases ball of energy that deals magical damage equal to [80/190/360]% of attack power.

form.name: Iori Yagami
form.background: A member of the Yagami clan, which is at odds with the Kusanagi clan. Iori is both the lead bassist of a popular band and a skilled fighter. He is usually quiet and uninterested in his surroundings, but his hatred for Kyo renders him unstable and belligerent whenver Kyo is around.

skill.passive: If enemy attacked by "108 Shiki: Yami Barai" is outside normal attack range, uses "Kin 1211 Shiki: Ya Otome" to stun one enemy, and deal magical equal to 350% of attack power. Cannot be pushed back during attack. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, resistance penetration is incrased by 300.

form.name: Iori Yagami
form.background: Iori receives an offer to fight in a mysterious fighting tournament, "The King of Fighters," and enters in his animosity against Kyo. It is revealed, however, the tournament is no ordinary competition: it is part of a greater scheme to revive Orochi, the eight-headed snake entity.

skill.passive: If enemy attacked by "108 Shiki: Yami Barai" is outside normal attack range, uses "Kin 1211 Shiki: Ya Otome" to stun one enemy, and deal magical equal to 350% of attack power. Cannot be pushed back during attack. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, resistance penetration is incrased by 300.

form.name: Iori Yagami
form.background: The Yagami clan, known long ago as the Yasakani clan, was one of the three families that sealed Orochi. Yet after being tricked by one of the Hakkesshu, the leader of Yagami clan ended up swearing a blood oath of loyalty to the snake entity. Its descendant and heir, Yagami, is thus controlled by Orochi in an attempt to kill Kyo and Chizuru, the other descendants of the Three Sacred Treasures... But at the last moment Iori awakens and binds Orochi, who directly receives Kyo's final blow - which ends up in a brilliant explosion that transports Iori to the dimension of Hasla.

skill.passive: If enemy attacked by "108 Shiki: Yami Barai" is outside normal attack range, uses "Kin 1211 Shiki: Ya Otome" to stun one enemy and deal magical equal to 610% of attack power. Cannot be pushed back during attack. Becomes immune to all damage except magical. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, resistance penetration is incrased by 300.

omegarugal.skillDescription: Deals an upper kick that deals physical damage equal to [60/115/200]% of attack power 2 times.

form.name: Omega Rugal
form.background: An extremely rich arms dealer of the black market, wealthy enough to own an enormous aircraft carrier. In his youth, Rugal lost one of his eyes in a fight against Goenitz, one of the Hakkesshu, but acquired the power of Orochi in its stead. Ever since then he has been expanding his influence through his powers.

skill.passive: Rugal cannot be pushed back. After normal attack, releases a ball of gravity that deals physical damage equal to 185% of attack power. (Once every 6 seconds) Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, motion speed is increased by 40% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Omega Rugal
form.background: Rugal has a peculiar hobby: defeating strong fighters and making their bodies into "trophies." In order to satisfy his desires, Rugal hosts the fighting tournament "The King of Fighters" and attempts to turn its participants into statues, but is defeated by Kusanagi Kyo. The enraged Rugal, gone mad by his defeat, blows his own aircraft carrier up into flames..

skill.passive: Rugal cannot be pushed back. After normal attack, releases a ball of gravity that deals physical damage equal to 185% of attack power. (Once every 6 seconds) Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, motion speed is increased by 40% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Omega Rugal
form.background: ... but Rugal, believed to be dead, returns much stronger than before: he has replaced his body with mechanical parts and unleashed the power of Orochi. Although he attempts revenge against Kyo, he is once more defeated. Rugal goes beserk, and just before the moment of his self-destruction, a brilliant explosion transports him to Hasla.

skill.passive: Rugal cannot be pushed back. After normal attack, releases a ball of gravity that deals physical damage equal to 275% of attack power. Also, attack power increases by 5% of remaining HP, and life steal in ratio to lost HP for 3 seconds. (Once every 6 seconds) Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, motion speed is increased by 40% for 8 seconds.

jin-kyung.skillDescription: Deals physical damage equal to (50/130/220)% of hero's attack based on the length of the chain skill used.

form.name: Jin-Kyung
form.background: The boy who wants to become the greatest general in history. On his way to go fishing, he unintentionally defeated a wild dog with his rod. This incident inspired his decision to practice his spearsmanship.

skill.passive: When ally's block is used after hero's chain-3 skill, Jin-Kyung throws a spear which deals physical damage equal to 10% of his HP 3 times.

form.name: General Jin-Kyung
form.background: Jin-Kyung gets recognized for his talented spearsmanship. While serving as a general in the empire, he saved the imperial prince from danger. Ever since then, Jin-Kyung became the right hand man of the imperial prince.

skill.passive: When ally's block is used after hero's chain-3 skill, Jin-Kyung throws a spear which deals physical damage equal to 10% of his HP 3 times.

form.name: Invincible General Jin-Kyung
form.background: The empire decides to hold a festival just for Jin-Kyung. While people were preparing for festival, Jin-Kyung went outside to get some fresh air and accidentally runs into Hong-Ran. At that moment, he fell into the dimentional portal and arrived at Hasla.

skill.passive: When ally's block is used after hero's chain-3 skill, Jin-Kyung throws a spear which deals physical damage equal to 20% of his HP 3 times.

rebecca.skillDescription: Hero throws an iron hammer which deals physical damage equal to (50/130/260)%. Mark of the Sun appears on hit enemies for 5 seconds.

form.name: Rebecca
form.background: Chen's only daugher. She is already well known for her outstanding skill in martial arts. Her strong will makes her feel obligated to join the expedition to conquer Han. During the long journey she meets Artair and falls in love with at first sight.

skill.passive: When marked enemies are attacked by ally, they receive additional physical damage equal to 25% of attacking Hero's attack power.

form.name: Battle Princess Rebecca
form.background: Rebecca and Altair ran away together after Altair was wounded in battle. They grew closer together as Rebecca nursed him back to health. However, when the war ended, they were caught and punished for deserting. Rebecca was forced to return home to Chen to face her outraged father.

skill.passive: When marked enemies are attacked by ally, they receive additional physical damage equal to 25% of attacking Hero's attack power.

form.name: War Princess Rebecca
form.background: Rebecca is placed under house arrest for running away from the battle. She hires Crow and orders him to bomb the house where she is kept. Crow makes it look like an accident and Rebecca successfully escapes. Now she journeys to find her beloved Altair.

skill.passive: When marked enemies are attacked by ally, they receive additional physical damage equal to 40% of attacking Hero's attack power. The maximum HP is increased by 10% during the attack.

may.skillDescription: Summons a dolphin that deals physical damage equal to (60/150/320)% of the Hero's attack power according to the chain numbers.

form.name: May
form.background: She was orphaned during the Holy War. Johnny, the leader of the Jellyfish air pirates, found and raised her since then. She was named May, since Johnny adopted her in May. She is a young, cute, and spunky member of the Jellyfish air pirates.

skill.passive: Whenever the hero takes a critical strike, a chain-3 skill is activated. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

form.name: May
form.background: May falls in love with Johnny. But one day, Johnny gets caught by the police. May decides to participate in a martial arts contest where the grand prize is to grant the winner's wish to bail Johnny out of prison. Meantime, Johnny has escaped from the prison by himself.

skill.passive: Whenever the hero takes a critical strike, a chain-3 skill is activated. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

form.name: May
form.background: After the invasion from Ramlethal, May develops a headache. She finds out that her origin was the reason, but thanks to her colleagues including Johnny, she is able to recover. While investigating the cause of this unknown disease with Johnny, both of them are ditched at Hasla due to an unexpected change in dimension.

skill.passive: Whenever the hero takes a critical strike, a chain-3 skill is activated. (Activates once every 3 seconds) Whenever another skill is used after May's chain-3 skill, a killer whale is summoned that deals physical damage equal to 30% of the enemy's maximum HP. (Activated once every 2 seconds)

sinkiske.skillDescription: When a block is used it activates Beak Driver that deals magic damage equal to (60/130/250)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Sin Kiske
form.background: A bounty hunter from another dimension. Born half human half gear. Sin grows much faster than humans because of his gear blood. In reality he is only 10 years old. For Sin's safety, Kai, Sin's father, has left Sin to Sol, the bounty hunter. Unfortunately, Sin knows nothing about his father and has always had a grudge against Kai.

skill.passive: When hero uses 3 blocks, immediately activates "It's time to grow". Afetr the activation block skill will change to RTL once. RTL deals magic damage equal to (120/260/500)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Sin Kiske
form.background: Sin has resolved all misunderstandings he has had with his father, after participating in wars with him. Meanwhile, "Senate" has cooked up a scheme to revive Justice the destroyer, but is blocked. However, due to "Ruthless Revelation", they lose Elphelt.

skill.passive: When hero uses 3 blocks, immediately activates "It's time to grow". Afetr the activation block skill will change to RTL once. RTL deals magic damage equal to (120/260/500)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Sin Kiske
form.background: Unexpected helper came to Sin's party. He was 'Raven', the close associate of 'That Man'. Sin and his party checked out that Raven has the same objective but a different reason to 'That Man', and accept Raven as a party for the journey. During the journey, an unexpected change in dimension occured, and Sin was ditched at Hasla.

skill.passive: When hero uses 3 blocks, immediately activates "It's time to grow". Afetr the activation block skill will change to RTL twice. RTL deals magic damage equal to (120/260/500)% of the hero's attack power.

billykane.skillDescription: Thrusts pole to deal physical damage equal to [90/180/270]% of attack power.

form.name: Billy Kane
form.background: A poor youth working in a factory belonging to Howard Connection. Billy works day and night to protect his younger sister Lily Cane, who is suffering from a heart disease.

skill.passive: Upon using block after ally's 3-chain, uses "Chou Kaen Senpuu Kon" that deals additional physical damage equal to 140% of HP. Enemies are pushed back while spinning flames. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor is increased by 350 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Billy Kane
form.background: One day Billy gets into a fight with the factory workers, defeating them all with his skills at the three sectional staff. He is noticed by Geese Howard, the CEO of Howard Connection, and becomes his personal bodyguard and later second-in-command.

skill.passive: Upon using block after ally's 3-chain, uses "Chou Kaen Senpuu Kon" that deals additional physical damage equal to 140% of HP. Enemies are pushed back while spinning flames. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor is increased by 350 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Billy Kane
form.background: Under Geese's orders to find out more about Orochi's powers, Billy enters "The King of Fighters." He tries to team up with Iori Yagami, only to be attacked and defeated by the ill-tempered Iori. At that moment, a brilliant explosion transports Billy to Hasla.

skill.passive: Upon using block after ally's 3-chain, uses "Chou Kaen Senpuu Kon" that deals additional physical damage equal to 235% of HP. Enemies are pushed back while spinning flames. Deals additional neutral damage equal to 30% of attack power per hit. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor is increased by 350 for 8 seconds.

hong-ran.skillDescription: Shoots a portable firecracker which deals magical damage equal to (80/150/350)% of hero's attack power to the enemy with least amount of HP left according to chain number.

form.name: Hong-Ran
form.background: Hong-Ran could never forget about the beautiful fireworks she watched at a festival when she was young. She decides to become a great fireworks craftsman. She always quotes, "I will become the greatest Queen of fireworks!"

skill.passive: When chain-3 skill is used, hit enemy becomes stunned for 0.5 seconds and their accuracy and chance of evasion decreases by 20% for 5 seconds.

form.name: Hong-Ran of Fireworks
form.background: Hong-Ran becomes the disciple of a famous fireworks craftsman. While she was training, she met Jin-Kyung and had a deep conversation about each other's future. Being inspired by Jin-Kyung's vision and diligence, she decided to work even harder to achieve her dreams.

skill.passive: When chain-3 skill is used, hit enemy becomes stunned for 0.5 seconds and their accuracy and chance of evasion decreases by 20% for 5 seconds.

form.name: Hong-Ran of Flame
form.background: Hong-Ran becomes the best fireworks craftsman in the empire. One day the emperor himself asked Hong-Ran to prepare for the national festival for Jin-Kyung. Excited to hear that, Hong-Ran works her hardest for Jin-Kyung to present the best festival. However, she was accidentally sucked up by the dimentional portal which opened up mysteriously.

skill.passive: When chain-3 skill is used, hit enemy becomes stunned for 0.5 seconds and their accuracy and chance of evasion decreases by 20% for 5 seconds. When ally uses chain-3 skill, hero fires installable firecracker which deals magical damage equal to 300% of attack power instead of auto attacking for 5 seconds.

altair.skillDescription: Hero shines a beam of moonlight towards the enemy at the rear. Targeted enemies are hit by shooting stars which deal magical damage equal to (7/20/45)% of Hero's attack power based on the length of the block chain.

form.name: Altair
form.background: Altair is the only son of an aristocrat. He is very kind-hearted and handsome and although he is not as strong as most men, he was taught the ways of archery by Giparang. When Chen invaded Han, he volunteered for the battle to fulfill his obligation as an aristocrat.

skill.passive: Mark of the moon appears on the ally at the front for 5 seconds when chain-3 skill is activated. Marked ally deals magical damage equal to 50% of targeted enemy's attack power to surrounding enemies per second.

form.name: Moonlight Artair
form.background: Altair shoots Rebecca's horse out from under her and she is thrown to the ground. However, Altair is surrounded by the Chen army and although he escapes, he is wounded in the process. Rebecca comes to his aid and he is able to get away.

skill.passive: Mark of the moon appears on the ally at the front for 5 seconds when chain-3 skill is activated. Marked ally deals magical damage equal to 5% of targeted enemy's attack power to surrounding enemies per second.

form.name: MoonShadow Artair
form.background: After the war, Altair's father sends him to recuperate in a small village. While living in the village alone, Altair remembers Rebecca and the aid she gave him. He realizes his love for her and leaves the village to find her.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is activated, a Lunar Mark appears on all allies, that increases their armor and resistance by 75%. The Lunar Mark also deals magical damage to surrounding enemies equal to 75% of the enemies' attack power every .5 seconds.

chippzanuff.skillDescription: Uses a Y blade that deals magical damage equal to (120/200/450)% of hero's atack power based on the chain length.

form.name: Chipp Zanuff
form.background: He almost got murdered by the Assassin's Guild, but a healing master saved his life and Chipp became his disciple. However, there was an attack from the Assasin's Guild and the master sacrificed himself to save Chipp. Since then Chipp's life is all about revenge.

skill.passive: When Y blade hits enemy, the hero gets 1 block by 50% chance at the cost of 30 SP.

form.name: Chipp Zanuff
form.background: During his trip he met various people, and realized that having more power is necessary to get rid of the infelicities. In order to be the most powerful person, he decided to become the chief of the nation, the president.

skill.passive: When Y blade hits enemy, the hero gets 1 block by 50% chance at the cost of 30 SP.

form.name: Chipp Zanuff
form.background: Chipp became a president of East Chipp Kingdom, the unauthorized state. To be recognized as an authorized state he seeks Ramlethal, who is fighting against the world. Finally he finds Ramlethal, but due to the unexpected change in dimension, he and his fellows arrived at Hasla.

skill.passive: When Y blade hits enemy, the hero gets 1 block by 75% chance at the cost of 20 SP. Using a block after ally use chain-3 will activate throwing knives that deal magical damage equal to (80/100/120)% of attack power each and create 1 block.

elpheltvalentine.skillDescription: Pistol-In-Law activates after the use of a 1 or 2 chain skill and deals physical damage equal to (150/230)% of hero's attack power. Using a chain 3 skill activates 'Miss Confil' dealing physical damage equal to 320% of hero's attack power.

form.name: Elphelt Valentine
form.background: One of the 'Valentine' twins created by 'Ruthless Revelation'. From an unknown alternate dimension, she was secretly hiding amongst humanity, waiting for her chance to strike. However, Elphelt became aware of emotion and it freed her from the control of 'Ruthless Revelation'.

skill.passive: Using a 1 or 2 chain skill activates Pistol Stance for the next 5 blocks dealing (100/150/220)% for, up to, the next 3 attacks. Using a 3 chain skill activates Miss Confil stance for the next 5 blocks dealing (150/220/350)% for, up to, the next 3 attacks. The final attack of each stance deals damage 3 times. After using 5 blocks, stance mode will end.

form.name: Elphelt Valentine
form.background: Elphelt pursuades her twin sister Ramlethal to make peace after stopping her from fighting against mankind. Everyone helped her defeat Justice, and a peaceful resolution was within reach. However 'Ruthless Revelation' regained control over Elphelt and forcer her to fight against Sol.

skill.passive: Using a 1 or 2 chain skill activates Pistol Stance for the next 5 blocks dealing (100/150/220)% for, up to, the next 3 attacks. Using a 3 chain skill activates Miss Confil stance for the next 5 blocks dealing (150/220/350)% for, up to, the next 3 attacks. The final attack of each stance deals damage 3 times. After using 5 blocks, stance mode will end.

form.name: Elphelt Valentine
form.background: Elphelt's newly found emotions were removed when 'Ruthless Revelation' regained control over her. He locked her in a dream world full of suffering. Through the dream world, a mysterious magic led Elphelt to Hasla.

skill.passive: Using a 1 or 2 chain skill activates Pistol Stance for the next 5 blocks dealing (100/175/280)% for, up to, the next 3 attacks. Using a 3 chain skill activates Miss Confil stance for the next 5 blocks dealing (150/300/450)% for, up to, the next 3 attacks. The final attack of each stance deals damage 3 times. After using 5 blocks, stance mode will end.

leonaheidern.skillDescription: Releases green backlashing ball of energy that deals physical damage equal to [100/150/200]% of attack power. Damage of normal attack is also increased by same coefficient for 8 seconds. (Can be stacked)

form.name: Leona Heidern
form.background: The adopted daugher of Heidern, a mercenary band general. Even though it has not been long since she entered military service, she shows great potential with her natural fighting ability. Cool and collected, she even refuses to call Heidern "father." Curiously, Leona has no memories of her past.

skill.passive: Upon using auto attack 10 times, dispatches a bomb on frontline enemy and denotes it to deal physical damage equal to 500% of attack power to surrounding enemies. Attack acknowledged as 3-chain. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, critical damage is increased by 45% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Leona Heidern
form.background: Heidern, suspicious about the true nature of "The King of Fighters," enters the tournament with Leona. As Orochi is revived, Leona's memories also return. It is revealed that Leona is  the daughter of Gaidel, the strongest incarnation of the strongest member of the Hakkesshu and the inheritor of Orochi's powers.

skill.passive: Upon using auto attack 10 times, dispatches a bomb on frontline enemy and denotes it to deal physical damage equal to 500% of attack power to surrounding enemies. Attack acknowledged as 3-chain. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, critical damage is increased by 45% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Leona Heidern
form.background: As Gaidel deemed his family more important than his responsibilities as a Hakkesshu, the enraged Goenitz, one of the Four Heavenly Kings, induced the Riot of Blood in the young Leona. Leona ends up killing her own parents, and had lost her memories in shock. Leona, now remembering her past, attempts to commit suicide... but at that moment a brilliant explosion transports Leona to Hasla.

skill.passive: Upon using auto attack 7 times, dispatches a bomb on frontline enemy and denotes it to deal physical damage equal to (500% of attack power + 10% of enemy's HP) to surrounding enemies. Attack acknowledged as 3-chain. Explosion damage penetrates armor equal to armor of frontline enemy. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, critical damage is increased by 45% for 8 seconds.

ramlethalvalentine.skillDescription: Deals magical damage equal to (120/240/450)% of the Hero's attack power based on chain lenth. When ally uses a block skill after Ramlethal uses her skill, she will cast one spell of the same chain length.

form.name: Ramlethal Valentine
form.background: One of the 'Valentine' twins created by 'Ruthless Revelation', the unknown existence of another dimension. As her only mission is to destroy mankind, she declares war on mankind.

skill.passive: Using a block skill after her chain-3 skill summons Kalbados that deals magical damage equal to 700% of the hero's attack power. In the meantime, Ramlethal's critical damage is increased by 20% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Ramlethal Valentine
form.background: Ramlethal's declaration was just a bait to revive Justice, the destroyer. Ramlethal tried self destruction to get rid of Sol and her party, but was stopped by Elphelt, the other twin. Since then, Ramlethal is being protected by Sol.

skill.passive: Using a block skill after her chain-3 skill summons Kalbados that deals magical damage equal to 700% of the hero's attack power. In the meantime, Ramlethal's critical damage is increased by 20% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Ramlethal Valentine
form.background: Ramlethal begins to feel emotional after interacting with Sol and others. She and Sol's party start to journey to save her twin sister from "Ruthless Revelation", but all of a sudden the unknown magic brought them to Hasla.

skill.passive: Using a block skill after her chain-3 skill summons Kalbados that deals magical damage equal to 700% of the hero's attack power. In the meantime, the critical strike damage of all your allies is increased by 30% for 8 seconds.

jack-o`.skillDescription: When a block is used, "Drop the Guillotine" activates dealing magic damage equal to (60/130/320)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Jack-O\`
form.background: Valentine' is from another dimension. Jack-O\` was created to stop the convergence of Elphelt and Justice. Jack-O\` was awakened much earlier than planned, just to stop the conspiracy of 'Ruthless Revelation'.

skill.passive: When hero uses a block skill twice, a ghost spawns next to the hero. Ghost deals magic damage equal to 250% of hero's attack power when it gets too far from an ally, or touches an enemy. When a block skill is used with an active ghost, a Knight, Lancer, or Magician Servant will be summoned from the ghost sequentially. Servant will rush to the enemy dealing magic damage equal to (100/230/450)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Jack-O\`
form.background: Jack-O\` was awakened in an incomplete state, so he needs a mask and candy to function. Suddenly, without permission Jack-O\` runs outside to have a look at the world.

skill.passive: When hero uses a block skill twice, a ghost spawns next to he hero. Ghost deals magic damage equal to 250% of hero's attack power when it gets too far from an ally, or touches an enemy. When a block skill is used with an active ghost, a Knight, Lancer, or Magician Servant will be summoned from the ghost sequentially. Servant will rush to the enemy dealing magic damage equal to (100/230/450)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Jack-O\`
form.background: Raven, the close associate of 'That Man' finds Jack-O\` and takes him back to where he should be, with 'Sold Badguy'. When Jack-O\` sees Sol's face, a mysterious change of dimension leads Jack-O\` to Hasla.

skill.passive: When hero uses a block skill twice, a ghost spawns next to the hero. Ghost deals magic damage equal to 250% of hero's attack power when it gets too far from an ally, or touches an enemy. When a block skill is used with an active ghost, a Knight, Lancer, or Magician Servant will be summoned from the ghost sequentially. Servant will rush to the enemy dealing magic damage equal to (100/230/450)% of the hero's attack power. When servant attacks an enemy, additional effects will trigger. (Knight : Attacked enemy's resistance decreases by 20% for 5 seconds, Lancer : Jack-O\`s attack power increases by 30% for 5 seconds, Magician : stuns the hit enemy)

chizurukagura.skillDescription: Projection of self dashes forward and deals magical damage equal to [145/194/285]% of attack power per hit.

form.name: Chizuru Kagura
form.background: The second daughter of the Kagura clan, a rich family that serves the Japanese royalty. The Kagura clan's real name is the Yata clan, one of the families who used the Three Sacred Treasures to seal Orochi long ago. But as Chizuru's older sister, Maki, bears the responsibilities of guarding the sealed Orochi, Chizuru is free to live as she pleases.

skill.passive: Activates additional "Rimen 85-Katsu: Reigi no Ishizue" every second block, and decreases enemy's sp by 40. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, attack power is increased by 300 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Chizuru Kagura
form.background: Chizuru's older sister Maki is murdered by one of the Four Heavenly Kings, Goenitz, who breaks the seals of the other Four Heavenly Kings of Orochi. In order to find a fighter who can kill Goenitz and avenge her sister's death, Chizuru hosts and enters "The King of Fighters."

skill.passive: Activates additional "Rimen 85-Katsu: Reigi no Ishizue" every second block, and decreases enemy's sp by 40. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, attack power is increased by 300 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Chizuru Kagura
form.background: The unleashed Four Heavenly Kings begin the ritual to revive Orochi. Chizuru decides that it is the time to use the powers of the Three Sacred Treasures and seal Orochi once more. Chizuru, Kyo Kusanagi, and Iori Yagami gather their powers to fight against Orochi, but Kyo's final attack results in an explosion that carry them to Hasla.

skill.passive: Activates additional "Rimen 85-Katsu: Reigi no Ishizue" every second block, and decreases enemy's sp by 40. Also deals one additional hit. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, attack power is increased by 300 for 8 seconds.

i-no.skillDescription: Heals a single ally by (190/260/335)% of hero's attack power and discharge electric wave that deals magical damage to frontline.

form.name: I-No
form.background: A witch living in another dimension. She was born with the ability to slip through time. Her ability made normal life boring and her interest in the world waned. She doesn't remember who she is, where she is from or how she got this ability.

skill.passive: Discharge Antidepressant Scale deals magical damage equal to 250% of hero's attack power when an ally uses a chain-3 skill. Enemy hit by block and Discharge Antidepressant gains a mark that has a 20% chance to block buffs. (once every 8 seconds)

form.name: I-No
form.background: Ramlethal has declared war against mankind and I-No has gone through this several times. She is disappointed with the fact that history hasn't changed at all. I-No has fought with Ramlethal before, but this time there is a good chance history may be different.

skill.passive: Discharge Antidepressant Scale deals magical damage equal to 250% of hero's attack power when an ally uses a chain-3 skill. Enemy hit by block and Discharge Antidepressant gains a mark that has a 20% to block buffs. (once every 8 seconds)

form.name: I-No
form.background: While I-No was living in the dark as 'That Man' asked for, she recognizes her true identity due to one incident. At the moment when the truth was being revealed, mysterious magic led I-No to Hasla.

skill.passive: Discharge Antidepressant Scale deals magical damage equal to 360% of hero's attack power when an ally uses a chain-3 skill. Enemy hit by block and Discharge Antidepressant gains a mark that has a 20% chance to block buffs and the party becomes immune to all debuffs when using blocks while the mark is active. (once every 6 seconds)

siekensou.skillDescription: Releases "Choukyuu Dan" that either (heals / deals neutral damage) equal to [11/16/20]% of hero's HP whenever it touches (ally / enemy).

form.name: Sie Kensou
form.background: Kensou became the disciple of Chin Gentsai, a famous master of martial arts, after a chance meeting. As he grew up without having much to eat. he is always hungry. Kensou may seem flippant and noisy, but in fact he is very serious and works hard at what he does.

skill.passive: If ally is attacked 6 times, eats meat dumpling to increase own health by 150% of attack power (Once every 4 seconds) Power MAX Effect: Maximum HP is increased by 10% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Sie Kensou
form.background: After hard training, Kensou earns not only the knowledge but the psychic powers of Chin Gentsai. While training in a lone cottage in the mountains with Athena Asamiya, the subject of his infatuation, Kensou receives an invitation to the mysterious tournament "The King of Fighters." Chin Gentsai takes his disciples Kensou and Athena to mark their progress.

skill.passive: If ally is attacked 6 times, eats meat dumpling to increase own health by 150% of attack power (Once every 4 seconds) Power MAX Effect: Maximum HP is increased by 10% for 8 seconds.

form.name: Sie Kensou
form.background: Kensou realizes the true objective of "The King of Fighters": the revival of Orochi, a being close to god, and his desire to end the human race for the sake of nature. In order to enlighten Orochi of the possibility of the human race, Kensou and Athena rush to the site of Orochi's revial. At that moment, a brilliant explosion transports Kensou to Hasla.

skill.passive: If ally is attacked 6 times, eats meat dumpling to increase own health by 250% of attack power. Has a 50% chance of reducing (physical/magical) damage by 75% until next meat dumpling. (Once every 4 seconds) Power MAX Effect: Maximum HP is increased by 10% for 8 seconds.

snowman.skillDescription: Strikes the frontline with a Christmas tree, dealing physical damage equal to (56/178/322)% of the Hero's atack power. It also fills your heart with cheer.

form.name: Snowman
form.background: Snowmen are notorious for leaving Christmas Trees on people's lawns and then just running away. No one wants to call them out on it though, they figure they can just wait for Spring.

skill.passive: Using skill blocks increases the Hero's attack power by (100/100/200) for 5 seconds. When an ally uses a chain-3 skill, the next Deck the Halls will count as chain-3 skill.

bearguy.skillDescription: Showers the area with soda, dealing (50/142/322)% physical damage based on the hero's attack power.

form.name: Bear Guy
form.background: This bear-man has the uncanny ability to control soda, which is a lot more useful than it sounds.

skill.passive: The attack speed and crit. chance of enemies hit by soda will be reduced by 50% for 5 seconds. When an ally uses a chain-3 skill, another chain-3 Soda Eruption will activate. (Once every 2 seconds)

fergus.skillDescription: Deals physical damage equal to (85/180/295)% of attack power according to the chain number.

form.name: Fergus
form.background: The only Blacksmith in the village. When he sees a strong weapon he just can't refrain from upgrading it. Every time outsiders visit the village looking for the 'legendary weapon hunter', Fergus close the shop and hide somewhere.

skill.passive: When the hero uses a block skill, Great Success Attack deals 350% of hero's attack power will be activated by 30% chance. Great Success Attack will be counted as chain-3 attack.

greenelf.skillDescription: Shoots a candy bar that deals (34/122/221)% physical damage based on the hero's attack power. It tastes like it's made of cinnamon and fire!

form.name: Green Elf
form.background: A mischievous elf. He shoots candy bars at children every Christmas, but always misses.

skill.passive: Enemies on fire have a 50% chance of being stunned for 1 second. When other heroes use a chain-3 skill, 2 candy bars will be summoned that deal physical damage equal to 221% of the Hero's attack power. (once every 2 sec)

a.k.a.santa.skillDescription: Throws (1/1/3) Mysterious Bell(s) each dealing (40/100/150)% of physical damage based on chain length.

form.name: A.K.A. Santa
form.background: Disguised as a saint that delivers presents to children every year, Santa is actually an assassin, who earns a lot of money from his contracts. The presents he leaves behind are actually trophies from the people he kills.

skill.passive: After using a chain-3 skill, the next ally's chain-1 skill will be counted as chain-3 skill. (Once every 2 seconds.)

halloweenchocolat.skillDescription: Shoots a Jack-o-Lantern that deals physical damage equal to (40/114/252)% of hero's attack power.

form.name: Halloween Chocolat
form.background: Chocolat prepared a lot for Halloween. When Bridget visited her shop, she sighed deeply. Bridget gave Chocolat a special gift, mentioning that it may help her chase off the naughty kids and increase sales. It was a pumpkin shooting gun!

skill.passive: Jack-o-Lantern shoots when a block skill is used. Has a 50% chance to explode after it hits an enemy and scatters candy around. Enemy hit by candy will take physical damage equal to 300% hero's attack power.

santaclaus.skillDescription: Deals (5/13/22)% magic damage based on the hero's attack power, with a hail of dirty socks.

form.name: Santa Claus
form.background: A Christmas icon. However, with the bad economy, he's having a hard time getting presents to every good boy and girl. He's considering making his criteria stricter next year...

skill.passive: Each sock reduces the target's SP by 5. When an ally uses a chain-3 skill, the next Maelstrom is counted as chain-3 skill. (Once every 2 seconds)

lovelychocolat.skillDescription: Explosive chocolates (max 10) fall from the sky dealing magic damage equal to (10/25/50)% of the Hero's attack power. The longer the chain, the more chocolates will fall!

form.name: Lovely Chocolat
form.background: Chocolat was just handing out bread to all the heroes until she went broke. So, she asked Bridget for help. Bridget gave her this costume and told her to make it work...

skill.passive: The next skill block activates as a chain-3 when used after an allied chain-3. Every time the chocolates deal damage, increase all allies' attack power by 5%.

tycoonwang.skillDescription: Summons a statue which heals near ally 8 times by (80/150/270)% of hero's attack power according to chain number.

form.name: Tycoon Wang
form.background: One day, millionare Tycoon Wang hears a rumor about a girl who sends people to other dimensions. With curiosity, he went to meet the girl to ask about the portal. Refusing the payment offer from Wang, the girl just opens the dimentional portal for her own fun without hesitation. That's the story of how Tycoon Wang arrived in Hasla.

skill.passive: When a block is used, near enemy's attack power is reduced by 50% by 50% chance and Tycoon Wang additionally summons a statue which deals magical damage equal to 50% of his attack power.

a.k.a.rudolph.skillDescription: Heals nearby allies 8 times for (10/25/52)% of the hero's attack power. It's big and beautiful.

form.name: A.K.A. Rudolph
form.background: A macho assassin with horns. No one dares look at him when he does his missions. Lately his fancy clothes are drawing people's attention, making his life difficult.

skill.passive: An ally gains 5 SP every time it is attacked while under the effect of Meathead Icon. If an ally who gained 5 SP uses a chain-3, then Rudolph will also use a chain-3. (Once every 2 sec)

chocolat.skillDescription: Up to 10 pastries will fall from the sky! Each bread eaten heals 50% of the Hero's attack power. Longer chains produce better pastries.

form.name: Chocolat
form.background: She works as the town's baker but lives in the shadow of her father, a legendary gladiator of the colosseum.

skill.passive: Pastries increase the hero's stats. Morning Bread increases the Hero's armor by 30. Croissants increases the Hero's attack power by 30 for 5 secs. Macaroons will increase the Hero's SP by 20.
